review:
I met Dr Geetha at my 7 weeks of pregnancy.. It was really a great experience with Dr Geetha ..Everything was smooth....she was there for all my concerns anytime ,Even after post delivery. Cleared all my doubts with a call or text, when I was not able to visit clinic...  I delivered a healthy baby  at 39 weeks ...
My sincere thanks to her.

We consulted a few other Dr.s but were never satisfied with the interaction, since with meat Dr. Geetha we are extremely satisfied & confident with interaction. we are extremely happy & healthy both mother & baby.
I had consulted Dr Geetha after Pregnancy kit confirms. She treated very well, suggested good diet and improves the Baby Growth.

We met Dr Geetha at Belenus Hospital at the time of 28 weeks of pregnancy. Since ours is twin pregnancy in single sack there was many complications and instead of going for delivery at 28 weeks Dr Geetha had reviewed previous reports and insisted frequent monitoring with weekly scan & medication. Thereafter we have travelled till 34.5 weeks and delivered healthy twin girl babies. I would recommend Dr Geetha for OBG & Gyn as she is one of the best in treating patients by being transparent by answering all our doubts and queries in a polite manner.

I would like to convey my sincere thanks to the entire team of champions at Belenus champion hospital, Bangalore. Dr. Geetha took care of me and had given a solution to my problem. Thank you for all the Champions. All the very best! ðŸ˜Š

I had met Dr. Geetha for the first time to confirm my pregnancy.... It was good experience dr had replied for all our query's and  i am waiting for my delivery.... so far everything is fine and i highly recommend the dr for OBG & Gyn.
Thank you ovum team.
